name: Crane Stance
shortdesc: You enter the stance of a crane, holding your arms in an imitation of a crane’s wings.
desc: You enter the stance of a crane, holding your arms in an imitation of a crane’s wings.

name: Dragon Stance
shortdesc: You enter the stance of a dragon and make powerful leg strikes like a lashing dragon’s tail.
desc: You enter the stance of a dragon and make powerful leg strikes like a lashing dragon’s tail.

name: Ki Rush
shortdesc: You can use ki to move with extraordinary speed and make yourself harder to hit.
desc: You can use ki to move with extraordinary speed and make yourself harder to hit. You gain the ki rush ki spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. The rules for ki spells are summarized in the sidebar on page 157, and the full rules for focus spells appear on page 300.

name: Ki Strike
shortdesc: Your study of the flow of mystical energy allows you to harness it into your physical strikes.
desc: Your study of the flow of mystical energy allows you to harness it into your physical strikes. You gain the ki strike ki spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. The rules for ki spells are summarized in the sidebar on page 157, and the full rules for focus spells appear on page 300.

name: Monastic Weaponry
shortdesc: You have trained with the traditional weaponry of your monastery or school.
desc:
You have trained with the traditional weaponry of your monastery or school. You gain access to uncommon weapons that have the monk trait and become trained in simple and martial monk weapons. When your proficiency rank for unarmed attacks increases to expert or master, your proficiency rank for these weapons increases to expert or master as well.

You can use melee monk weapons with any of your monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks, though not if the feat or ability requires you to use a single specific type of attack, such as Crane Stance.
hint: You can use melee monk weapons with any of your monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks, though not if the feat or ability requires you to use a single specific type of attack, such as Crane Stance.

name: Mountain Stance
shortdesc: You enter the stance of an implacable mountain allowing you to strike with the weight of an avalanche.
desc: You enter the stance of an implacable mountain allowing you to strike with the weight of an avalanche.

name: Rain of Embers Stance
shortdesc: You enter the stance of an enraged phoenix.

name: Tiger Stance
shortdesc: You enter the stance of a tiger and can make tiger claw attacks.
desc: You enter the stance of a tiger and can make tiger claw attacks.

name: Wolf Stance
shortdesc: You enter the stance of a wolf, low to the ground with your hands held like fanged teeth.
desc: You enter the stance of a wolf, low to the ground with your hands held like fanged teeth.

name: Brawling Focus
shortdesc: You know how to make the most of your attacks when fighting hand-to-hand.
desc: You know how to make the most of your attacks when fighting hand-to-hand. You gain access to the critical specialization effects of unarmed strikes in the brawling group and weapons in the brawling group. If you have Monastic Weaponry, you also gain the critical specialization effects of all monk weapons in which you are trained.
internalNote: The effect on Monastic Weaponry is hardcoded.

name: Crushing Grab
shortdesc: Like a powerful constrictor, you crush targets in your unyielding grasp.
desc: Like a powerful constrictor, you crush targets in your unyielding grasp. When you successfully Grapple a creature, you can deal bludgeoning damage to that creature equal to your Strength modifier. You can make this attack nonlethal with no penalty.
hint: When you successfully Grapple a creature, you can deal bludgeoning damage to that creature equal to your Strength modifier. You can make this attack nonlethal with no penalty.

name: Dancing Leaf
shortdesc: You are as light as a leaf whirling in the breeze.
desc: You are as light as a leaf whirling in the breeze. When you Leap or succeed at a High Jump or Long Jump, increase the distance you jump by 5 feet. When calculating the damage you take from falling, don’t count any distance fallen while you are adjacent to a wall.
hint: When you Leap or succeed at a High Jump or Long Jump, increase the distance you jump by 5 feet. When calculating the damage you take from falling, don’t count any distance fallen while you are adjacent to a wall.

name: Elemental Fist
shortdesc: You call upon the power of the elements, infusing your ki with elemental energy and allowing your attacks to deal energy damage.
desc: You call upon the power of the elements, infusing your ki with elemental energy and allowing your attacks to deal energy damage. When you cast ki strike, in addition to the damage types normally available, you can deliver the extra damage in the form of a gust of storm-tossed wind (dealing electricity damage and gaining the air trait), a chunk of stone (dealing bludgeoning damage and gaining the earth trait), a flickering flame (dealing fire damage), or a crashing wave of frigid water (dealing cold damage and gaining the water trait).

name: Stunning Fist
shortdesc: The focused power of your flurry threatens to overwhelm your opponent.
desc: The focused power of your flurry threatens to overwhelm your opponent. When you target the same creature with two Strikes from your Flurry of Blows, you can try to stun the creature. If either Strike hits and deals damage, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or be stunned 1 (or stunned 3 on a critical failure). This is an incapacitation effect.
hint: When you target the same creature with two Strikes from your Flurry of Blows, you can try to stun the creature. If either Strike hits and deals damage, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or be stunned 1 (or stunned 3 on a critical failure). This is an incapacitation effect.

name: Deflect Arrows
shortdesc: Your reflexes allow you to deflect ranged attacks.
desc: Your reflexes allow you to deflect ranged attacks.

name: Flurry of Maneuvers
shortdesc: Your flurry is a combination of maneuvers.
desc: Your flurry is a combination of maneuvers. You can replace one or both of your attacks during a Flurry of Blows with Grapples, Shoves, or Trips.
hint: Your can replace one or both of your attacks during a Flurry of Blows with Grapples, Shoves, or Trips.

name: Flying Kick
shortdesc: You launch yourself at a foe.
desc: You launch yourself at a foe.

name: Guarded Movement
shortdesc: Your guard is up, even while moving.
desc: Your guard is up, even while moving. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by your movement.
hint: You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by your movement.

name: Sacred Ki
shortdesc: The power of your faith suffuses your ki
desc: The power of your faith suffuses your ki. When you select this feat, choose chaos, evil, good, or law. Your choice must match one of your deity’s alignment components.\n\nWhen you cast the ki strike focus spell and damage a creature whose alignment is opposite your chosen alignment, you can choose for the ki strike damage to be of the chosen type. Additionally, you can substitute the damage from ki blast (or other ki spells that deal force damage, at the GM’s discretion) with damage of your chosen alignment.

name: Sacred Ki: Chaos
shortdesc: The power of your faith suffuses your ki
desc: When you cast the ki strike focus spell and damage a creature whose alignment is Lawful, you can choose for the ki strike damage to be Chaotic. Additionally, you can substitute the damage from ki blast (or other ki spells that deal force damage, at the GM’s discretion) with damage of your chosen alignment.

name: Sacred Ki: Evil
shortdesc: The power of your faith suffuses your ki
desc: When you cast the ki strike focus spell and damage a creature whose alignment is Good, you can choose for the ki strike damage to be Unholy. Additionally, you can substitute the damage from ki blast (or other ki spells that deal force damage, at the GM’s discretion) with damage of your chosen alignment.

name: Sacred Ki: Good
shortdesc: The power of your faith suffuses your ki
desc: When you cast the ki strike focus spell and damage a creature whose alignment is Evil, you can choose for the ki strike damage to be Holy. Additionally, you can substitute the damage from ki blast (or other ki spells that deal force damage, at the GM’s discretion) with damage of your chosen alignment.

name: Sacred Ki: Law
shortdesc: The power of your faith suffuses your ki
desc: When you cast the ki strike focus spell and damage a creature whose alignment is Chaotic, you can choose for the ki strike damage to be Lawful. Additionally, you can substitute the damage from ki blast (or other ki spells that deal force damage, at the GM’s discretion) with damage of your chosen alignment.

name: Stand Still
shortdesc: You strike out when your foe tries to flee.
desc: You strike out when your foe tries to flee.

name: Wholeness of Body
shortdesc: You can restore your health by tapping into your ki.
desc: You can restore your health by tapping into your ki. You gain the wholeness of body ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

name: Abundant Step
shortdesc: You can teleport yourself a short distance.
desc: You can teleport yourself a short distance. You gain the abundant step ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

name: Crane Flutter
shortdesc: You interpose your arm between yourself and your opponent.
desc: You interpose your arm between yourself and your opponent.

name: Dragon Roar
shortdesc: You bellow, instilling fear in your enemies.
desc: You bellow, instilling fear in your enemies.

name: Ki Blast
shortdesc: You can unleash an impactful cone of force by channeling your ki.
desc: You can unleash an impactful cone of force by channeling your ki. You gain the ki blast ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

name: Mountain Stronghold
shortdesc: You focus on your connection to the earth and call upon the mountain to block attacks against you.

name: Tiger Slash
shortdesc: You make a fierce swipe with both hands.

name: Water Step
shortdesc: You can Stride across liquid and surfaces that don’t support your weight.

name: Whirling Throw
shortdesc: You propel your grabbed or restrained foe a great distance.
desc:
You propel your grabbed or restrained foe a great distance. You can throw the creature any distance up to 10 feet, plus 5 feet × your Strength modifier. If you successfully throw the creature, it takes bludgeoning damage equal to your Strength modifier plus 1d6 per 10 feet you threw it.

Attempt an Athletics check against the foe’s Fortitude DC. You take a –2 circumstance penalty to your check if the target is one size larger than you and a –4 circumstance penalty if it’s larger than that. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your check if the target is one size smaller than you and a +4 circumstance bonus if it’s smaller than that.

name: Wolf Drag
shortdesc: You rip your enemy off their feet.

name: Arrow Snatching
shortdesc: You pluck missiles from the air and hurl them back at their source.

name: Ironblood Stance
shortdesc: You enter the stance of impenetrable iron, refusing to yield to any blow.

name: Mixed Maneuver
shortdesc: You combine two different maneuvers together into a single flowing whole.

name: Tangled Forest Stance
shortdesc: You extend your arms like gnarled branches to interfere with your foes’ movements.

name: Wall Run
shortdesc: You defy gravity, traversing vertical planes as easily as the ground.

name: Wild Winds Initiate
shortdesc: You learn a mystical stance that lets you attack from a distance.

name: Knockback Strike
shortdesc: You focus your strength into a blow powerful enough to push an enemy away from you.

name: Sleeper Hold
shortdesc: You pinch crucial points of your target’s nervous system, impeding its ability to function.

name: Wind Jump
shortdesc: You gather the wind beneath you, allowing you to soar as you jump.

name: Winding Flow
shortdesc: Any journey consists of more than simply reaching your destination.

name: Diamond Soul
shortdesc: You have fortified your body and mind against eldritch effects.

name: Disrupt Ki
shortdesc: Your strike can block a creature's inner life force.

name: Improved Knockback
shortdesc: Your shoves cause the target to go farther.

name: Meditative Focus
shortdesc: Your meditation is so effective that you can achieve a deep focus.

name: Stance Savant (Monk)
shortdesc: You enter a stance without a thought.

name: Ironblood Surge
shortdesc: You steel yourself, preparing to resist oncoming attacks and using your muscles to absorb the impact.

name: Mountain Quake
shortdesc: You stomp, shaking the earth beneath you and causing quakes.

name: Tangled Forest Rake
shortdesc: You reposition foes with raking attacks.

name: Timeless Body
shortdesc: You cease aging.

name: Tongue of the Sun and Moon
shortdesc: You have transcended the barriers between words and meaning.

name: Enlightened Presence
shortdesc: You exude an aura of resolve.

name: Master of Many Styles
shortdesc: You move between stances in an unceasing dance.

name: Quivering Palm
shortdesc: Your strikes can kill foes.

name: Shattering Strike
shortdesc: The force of your considered blow shatters objects and defenses alike.

name: Wild Winds Gust
shortdesc: You store up energy and release it in an enormous gust of rushing wind.

name: Diamond Fists
shortdesc: Your body hardens as you combine your attacks, making your finishing blows more damaging.

name: Empty Body
shortdesc: You transmute your body into an ethereal form.

name: Meditative Wellspring
shortdesc: When you clear your mind, your focus comes flowing back in a powerful rush.

name: Swift River
shortdesc: You flow like water, avoiding all restraints.

name: Enduring Quickness
shortdesc: You move as fast and as high as the wind itself.

name: Fuse Stance
shortdesc: You have combined two stances into a single stance all your own.

name: Golden Body
shortdesc: Strike harder and heal more rapidly.

name: Impossible Technique
shortdesc: You execute a maneuver that defies possibility.
